query:
SELECT 'courses' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM courses
UNION ALL
SELECT 'course_modules', COUNT(*) FROM course_modules
UNION ALL
SELECT 'lessons', COUNT(*) FROM lessons
UNION ALL
SELECT 'activities', COUNT(*) FROM activities
UNION ALL
SELECT 'quiz_questions', COUNT(*) FROM quiz_questions
UNION ALL
SELECT 'learning_paths', COUNT(*) FROM learning_paths
UNION ALL
SELECT 'path_courses', COUNT(*) FROM path_courses;
